infos.value: Wh-why...? Even on the brink of death, he's so strong...
It's almost as if he can predict our movements.
Your movements are easy to read.
That's right. I know what you are going to do before you do it.
That's why I am craven. It has always frightened me.
I locked myself inside these castle walls out of fear of my own power.
Y-you must go, Vinera. I need you to survive...even if I cannot follow...
I will not let you touch a single hair on Lord Dario's head!
